title: The Esoteric Path of Marriage: A Guide To Spiritual Enlightenment Through Relationship
description: "The Enlightened Relationship Book the World has been waiting for."Imagine forging a relationship that is a vehicle for your Spiritual Liberation. A relationship that allows you to walk the path of Spiritual Enlightenment with a partner.The Esoteric Path of Marriage sets out a blueprint for relationship in the coming age, comprised of practical guidance, universal truths, insights, stories and spiritual practices to help lead marriage to its highest purpose: a relationship that heals mental, emotional, sexual and spiritual wounds and guides the partnership to the ultimate freedom: union with the true Self.Whether this is your first exploration of the inner-Self or you have long been on an inward journey; this book will transform you and your relationship with your partner.Single? It will open up your ability to have more conscious, new paradigm, Enlightened relationships in the future.
author: Maha Brown
